definitions.example: I went on the retreat to the monastery, thinking I would be sleeping in a spartan cell, only to discover a simple but comfortable bedroom.

definitions.definition: Resolute in the face of danger or adversity.
definitions.example: The spartan legionaries vowed to fight to the death.
After ten years as a fashion designer in the rough-and-tumble Garment District, Eloise left New York for the spartan but serene life of a farmer's wife.
